Commemoration of the taking of the Bastille
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A very large tree with artistic images, shields, flags, furniture, and other items burns with flames and smoke at the base of it. A crowd of men and women stand around it, watching and cheering. Troops also stand in their platoons watching the celebration
